Uses of Interface
org.apache.nutch.protocol.Protocol

  • Packages that use Protocol 
    Package Description
    org.apache.nutch.protocol
    Classes related to the Protocol interface, see also org.apache.nutch.net.protocols.
    org.apache.nutch.protocol.file
    Protocol plugin which supports retrieving local file resources.
    org.apache.nutch.protocol.ftp
    Protocol plugin which supports retrieving documents via the ftp protocol.
    org.apache.nutch.protocol.htmlunit
    Protocol plugin which supports retrieving documents via the http protocol.
    org.apache.nutch.protocol.http.api
    Common API used by HTTP plugins (http, httpclient)
    org.apache.nutch.protocol.okhttp
    Protocol plugin based on okhttp, supports http, https, http/2.

    • Uses of Protocol in org.apache.nutch.protocol

      Methods in org.apache.nutch.protocol that return Protocol 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Protocol ProtocolFactory.getProtocol(java.lang.String urlString)
      Returns the appropriate Protocol implementation for a url.
      Protocol ProtocolFactory.getProtocol(java.net.URL url)
      Returns the appropriate Protocol implementation for a url.
      Protocol ProtocolFactory.getProtocolById(java.lang.String id) 
      Methods in org.apache.nutch.protocol with parameters of type Protocol 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      crawlercommons.robots.BaseRobotRules RobotRulesParser.getRobotRulesSet(Protocol protocol, Text url, java.util.List<Content> robotsTxtContent)
      Fetch robots.txt (or it's protocol-specific equivalent) which applies to the given URL, parse it and return the set of robot rules applicable for the configured agent name(s).
      abstract crawlercommons.robots.BaseRobotRules RobotRulesParser.getRobotRulesSet(Protocol protocol, java.net.URL url, java.util.List<Content> robotsTxtContent)
      Fetch robots.txt (or it's protocol-specific equivalent) which applies to the given URL, parse it and return the set of robot rules applicable for the configured agent name(s).

      This class is a protocol plugin used for file: scheme.

    • Uses of Protocol in org.apache.nutch.protocol.ftp

      Classes in org.apache.nutch.protocol.ftp that implement Protocol 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Ftp
      This class is a protocol plugin used for ftp: scheme.
      Methods in org.apache.nutch.protocol.ftp with parameters of type Protocol 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      crawlercommons.robots.BaseRobotRules FtpRobotRulesParser.getRobotRulesSet(Protocol ftp, java.net.URL url, java.util.List<Content> robotsTxtContent)
      The hosts for which the caching of robots rules is yet to be done, it sends a Ftp request to the host corresponding to the URL passed, gets robots file, parses the rules and caches the rules object to avoid re-work in future.
